newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso ends 1.9 lower vs dlr at 1,024.10.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso ends 1.9 lower vs dlr at 1,024.10.

text.p: Colombia's peso closed 1.9 lower against the dollar at 1,024.10 in lackluster trading on the country's interbank market, dealers said.

"The market was very quiet. There weren't many operations involving the corporate sector," one dealer said in a telephone interview. He and others attributed the lull to the partial holiday in the United States.
Dealers reported just 144 trades for a below-average total of $64.8 million and said the peso held in a 1,022.30 to 1,024.50 range.
